labels.label: Replace new line with ". ", so it's 1 row in CSV. In Search Value, press "shift+enter" to add new line character.
Bundle up to 10 CSV rows in one file
Add file to S3 bucket. Parameters - - AWS S3 Bucket - AWS S3 Bucket Subdirectory - AWS - Access Key ID (sensitive value) - AWS - Secret Access Key (sensitive value)

Invoke Twitter API v2 - https://api.twitter.com/2/tweets/search/recent. Update query params as needed.
Parameters - - Twitter Search Term - Twitter API v2 Bearer Token
Run Schedule - every 15 seconds
Transform inbound tweets JSON to easily parseable JSON. To test Jolt transformations, use https://jolt-demo.appspot.com/

entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

value.name: Max Length To Put In Attribute
